channel.title: Some things to improve server?
channel.description:
I'm looking around for some things to help with my server, such as anti-cheat,, something to stop massers like instant ip ban if you click alot, and if you try to use ::noclip or ::lag = instant ban. Could anyone help me out here?
EDIT: I was looking at the sticky under Sever and Source protection, but I don't know which one's best or which is absolutely neccesary.(sp?), so if you could inform me on that also, that would be great ^.^ Thanks in advance.

item.title: Some things to improve server?
item.dc:creator: @dragonkid575 dragonkid575
item.description:
@dragonkid575 wrote:

I know, but it’s too much of a problem. Server lags like hell, so I want to prevent these things as much as possible

Read full topic
